name: Dark Forum for Deviant Art
description: Change the default green forums to match Eclipse Dark Theme.
additional_info:
This theme is a *temporary fix* while we wait for the DA devs to release the official forums redesign.

Some areas still need work like the stash panel. I am working on it. 

Disclaimer: I am not DeviantArt staff or a dev. I am not officially affiliated with DeviantArt or Wix.
